articles.content: People are looking for electric cars more than ever, according to the worlds largest search engine. No, not Bing or Baidu, but Google. The tech giant says web searches for EVs and their associated co… [+2388 chars]

articles.title: Buying an NFT was way more complicated than it should be - Business Insider
articles.description: I had to buy crypto, open a digital wallet, wait a week to actually use my crypto on apps, and then had to connect them all. That's just half of it.
articles.content:
Earlier this month, I bought an NFT on OpenSea, the largest online marketplace for buying and selling digital assets.
I wrote about how arduous the process was and how long it took me when starting … [+3432 chars]
